name: Edwin Sanjaya
title: Information System Master Graduate
Data Analyst
Business Analyst
Product Manager
Software Engineer in Test
content: Edwin is a Master of Science in Information Systems and Applications, Experienced Product Management Specialist and Software Engineer. Specializes in IT with a focus on e-commerce, data, web technologies, with a keen interest in data analysis, gaming industry and digital commerce. Values a growth mindset and compassion as foundational to his success.
